Interface UpsightAnalyticsApi


  • public interface UpsightAnalyticsApi
    The Upsight Analytics API.

      • getLatestSessionInfo

        UpsightSessionInfo getLatestSessionInfo()
        Gets information about the current Upsight session.
        Returns:
        The UpsightSessionInfo.

      • recordSessionless

        void recordSessionless(UpsightAnalyticsEvent event)
        Records an UpsightAnalyticsEvent not associated with a particular session.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to record.

      • record

        void record(UpsightAnalyticsEvent event)
        Records an UpsightAnalyticsEvent.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to record.

      • registerDataProvider

        void registerDataProvider(UpsightDataProvider provider)
        Allows registering a UpsightDataProvider in order to provide contextual information to the analytics data collection.
        A registered provider can not override keys provided by another. If that happens this method will throw IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        provider - an provider instance.

      • trackActivity

        void trackActivity(android.app.Activity activity,
                   UpsightLifeCycleTracker.ActivityState activityState)
        Manually tracks an Activity for session management. This typically does not need to be called as tracking of Activity is automatic in most cases, except when you wish to track an Activity that was started before you created the UpsightContext. In this case, you should call this method with that Activity and UpsightLifeCycleTracker.ActivityState.STARTED as parameters.

        This must be called from the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity to track in this Upsight session.
        activityState - The UpsightLifeCycleTracker.ActivityState to track the Activity as.

      • setOptOutStatus

        void setOptOutStatus(boolean optOut)
        Sets the flag used to indicate whether the user has opted out for data collection.
        Parameters:
        optOut - true to opt-out of data collection; false for default behaviour.

      • getOptOutStatus

        boolean getOptOutStatus()
        Gets the flag used to indicate whether the user has opted out for data collection.

      • trackLocation

        void trackLocation(UpsightLocationTracker.Data locationData)
        Tracks the device location. It is important to note that you must provide a reasonable expiry to the location information so the SDK will not use a stale location.
        Parameters:
        locationData - an instance of UpsightLocationTracker.Data

      • purgeLocation

        void purgeLocation()
        Purges com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.provider.LocationTracker.Data from the DataStore

      • putUserAttribute

        void putUserAttribute(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Adds String User Attribute.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key of the user attribute which must be specified in the Android Manifest at compile time as meta-data in the format <meta-data android:name="com.upsight.user_attribute.string.attribute_name" />.
        value - The value of the custom attribute.

      • trackPurchase

        void trackPurchase(int quantity,
                   java.lang.String currency,
                   double price,
                   double totalPrice,
                   java.lang.String product,
                   android.content.Intent responseData,
                   UpsightPublisherData publisherData)
            throws UpsightException
        Tracks a Google Play in-app purchase event. This should be called in the Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) implementation regardless of the resultCode value to ensure that canceled purchases are tracked.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The number of goods purchased.
        currency - The currency as a 3-character ISO 4217 code.
        price - The price per unit in local currency.
        totalPrice - The total price of the transaction, including fractional amounts of the currency, before store fees have been taken into account.
        product - The product ID of the Google Play in-app product.
        responseData - The purchase response data Intent from Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent). See Google Play In-app Billing Version 3 API.
        publisherData - Optional UpsightPublisherData.
        Throws:
        UpsightException - Thrown when the purchase data is malformed or missing critical data such that the purchase cannot be tracked.
